content: get ready to create a spooky yet adorable eyeball squish with this intermediate-level crochet pattern perfect for halloween decor or as a fun gift for a fellow yarn enthusiast this pattern includes detailed written instructions and a helpful video tutorial to guide you through the construction process worked in the round and featuring surface crochet for the veiny details this project will challenge your skills and result in a unique finished piece customize your squish with different color combinations and unleash your creativity **unique features-** intermediate level pattern for a challenging yet rewarding project detailed written instructions and video tutorial for guidance worked in the round with surface crochet for intricate details customizable with different color combinations for a unique finish **materials needed-** us-l 8 0 mm hook **susan bates** https //amzn to/3ttzdqy 230 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/46pjwna 6 - super bulky 100% polyester 300g/10 5 oz 201 m/220 yds a coal - 20 yds b dark teal - 40 yds c vintage white - 150 yds d cranberry - 20 yds **10 microbead pillow ball** https //amzn to/3zqefkm or fiber fill **stitch markers** https //amzn to/3mbefzs
